songs.title: Priestess of Mars
songs.lyrics:
Eye the backstreet sorceress
Perfect in thy nakedness
Enchanted flesh beneath the moon
High priestess, I'll live for you

I have searched three worlds to find
Climbed black mountains in my mind
The real empire you are
My priestess of mars

Lost like unfamiliar stain
Bruises locked within my present state
With eyes that holds no face
The stars reached out and they drugged me
Reach out in space

You are my priestess of mars
